casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. RICHARD DICKENSON, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 4724 DATED this 18th day of March, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Twenty (20) years with Ten (10) years suspended imposed on November 8, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank R. Allen Beck, Attorney at Law, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes.
